wikipedia_page.main: June Eric-Udorie (born 18 June 1998) is a writer and feminist campaigner based in Great Britain. She is a journalist and blogger for The Guardian and the New Statesman as well as Cosmopolitan. In 2016, the BBC included her in the list of 100 Women for "inspirational and influential women for 2016".

response: ** June Eric-Udorie (Editor), Can We All Be Feminists?: Seventeen writers on intersectionality, identity and finding the right way forward for feminism
